question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm-environment/src/environment.rs] [Function: fetch_config_and_update_hash()] [Deserialization vulnerability] Can malformed bytes in StateView cause OnChainConfig deserialization to panic or produce corrupted configs that pass validation but cause undefined behavior? (High)

(High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm-environment/src/environment.rs] [Function: Environment::new()] [Gov sim flag bypass] Since inject_create_signer_for_gov_sim is deprecated and marked with #[allow(deprecated)], can attackers exploit legacy code paths that check this flag to enable simulation mode in production? [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm-environment/src/environment.rs] [Function: Environment::new()] [Timed feature override injection] Can an attacker exploit get_timed_feature_override() to inject malicious feature profiles that enable unsafe features or disable critical security checks? [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm-environment/src/environment.rs] [Function: features()] [Feature flag race condition] Can feature flags change between environment creation and transaction execution, causing validators to execute with inconsistent feature sets? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm-environment/src/environment.rs] [Function: Environment::new()] [Timed feature serialization] Is the timed feature override profile serialization deterministic?
